CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(MatchingType__c, 'Threshold Match'), 'Trigger alert if there are ' + TEXT(MatchingThresholdRecordCount__c) + ' or more matches within a ' + TEXT(MatchingThresholdTimePeriodIncrement__c) + ' ' + LOWER(TEXT(MatchingThresholdTimePeriodUnit__c)) + ' time period', 'Trigger alert for any matches' )
CustomField.label: Matching Threshold Summary
